title: spack install throws up Error with no explanation, output of --debug included
body:
### Expected Result

spack install works as directed or gives an appropriate explanation as to why it fails

### Actual Result

spack throws up Error with no explanation at all. 

For example : 
```
[sajid@xrmlite ncurses-6.0]$ spack install python@3.6.5 %intel@19.0.0.046
==> bzip2 is already installed in /home/sajid/packages/spack/opt/spack/linux-centos7-x86_64/intel-19.0.0.046/bzip2-1.0.6-g6epdp7y4ina5z52yf5xpz74sngpkzyg
==> pkgconf is already installed in /home/sajid/packages/spack/opt/spack/linux-centos7-x86_64/intel-19.0.0.046/pkgconf-1.4.0-jjsb5qolv2aoepxe2zicbj2qnlu2jez3
==> Error:
```
